alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 230 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elmwood, or over Metairie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Avondale, East New Orleans, Jefferson, Harahan, Westwego, Elmwood, Bridge City, River Ridge, Waggaman, Ama, New Orleans Armstrong Airport and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 224 and 253. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans
